name: 3.4.1.14. Food Shortage

cf.path: Map Notes#/CF_SEP/PFRPG - Kingdom Building - GM Version

content: Spoilage, treachery, or bad luck has caused a food shortage this turn. Attempt a Stability check. If you succeed, Consumption in the next Upkeep phase increases by 50%. If you fail, Consumption in the next Upkeep phase increases by 100%
